attributes.action: Make display of food hygiene ratings mandatory in England.
attributes.additional_details:
Government spending of £82 million on FSA for 2016/17.  
https://www.google.co.uk/url?sa=t&source=web&rct=j&url=https://www.food.gov.uk/sites/default/files/fsa160311.pdf&ved=0ahUKEwi_ntj5jr3QAhWoJMAKHcpsBAMQFggzMAM&usg=AFQjCNHBEjcc-g8EtGVmLHNEhm9gvJIVoQ&sig2=N0Jt6jUGioEKqGzQdmlthQ
attributes.background:
Many takeaways and restaurants in our area have scores of 0,1 or 2 out of 5, yet most people are unaware of this.
Displaying "Scores on the Doors" is compulsory in Wales, and legislation is being prepared in Northern Ireland and Scotland. Our local MP fobs off enquiries with meaningless replies.
